item.description:
NO COVER! It's Labor Day weekend-- let's do it again!

This event is cross-posted with Boston Live Music meetup.

THE FIELD has a great NEW PATIO (if rain, the indoor back room is really nice too), so you get to meet people. (It will get kind of loud at the Cantab after 9:15.)

The patio features a kind of low-key ongoing party atmosphere. Seating is limited, but people are also mixing & mingling while standing near counters.

Then at 9:15 we move a block away to the Cantab, --stay longer at The Field or join us there whenever suits you.

http://www.cantab-lounge.com/public_html/ca...

A good house band opens up the set around 9:15, & people start dancing. Followed by reliably cool guest musicians about 40 minutes later. Rock, Motown, blues, even funk. Lasts until about 1:30 Am.

NOTE the Cantab accepts CASH ONLY for drinks, etc. Hint-- option: three blocks down the street at the Middle East (480 Mass. Ave) there is professional-level belly dancing from 10- 11, no cover! It's a restaurant but most people just stand at the bar while the dancers zigzag between the tables.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a white pirate shirt.
item.name: The Field/ CANTAB Lounge FREE dancing & LIVE music
